name: Goddle Royale
description:
Select your skill by pressing Q,W,E or R and left click to cast it on enemies!

A God Battle Royale Simulator made by 3 friends.

You are a god and you must keep your only believer alive!

Our team's second game and our first Ludum Dare submission.

Fullscreen recommended.

Rate here:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/goddle-royale
